remarks: The support of a function in maps to notation.  (Contributed by AV, 10-Apr-2019.)  (Revised by AV, 28-May-2019.)
statement:
mptsuppdifd.f $e |- F = ( x e. A |-> B ) $.
mptsuppdifd.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
mptsuppdifd.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. W ) $.
mptsuppd.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. U ) $.
mptsuppd $p |- ( ph -> ( F supp Z ) = { x e. A | B =/= Z } ) $.
$d A x $.
$d Z x $.
$d ph x $.
